titleStmt.title: [A discourse for parents honour and authoritie Written respectiuely to reclaime a young man that was a counterfeit Iesuite.]
De patrio jure. English
titleStmt.author: Ayrault, Pierre, 1536-1601.
Budden, John, 1566-1620.
